meanings.definition: A person who is lazy or idle.
meanings.sent1: The loun sat on the couch all day without doing anything productive.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a loun and help with the chores around the house.
meanings.sent3: The loun pretended to be asleep to avoid work.
meanings.sent4: The cat was a loun, lounging in the sun all afternoon.
meanings.sent5: Being a loun means missing out on all the fun activities.

meanings.definition: To move or act lazily or sluggishly.
meanings.sent1: She decided to loun around in bed instead of getting up early.
meanings.sent2: The sloth likes to loun in the trees, moving very slowly.
meanings.sent3: The turtle seemed to loun along the path, taking its time.
meanings.sent4: The river seemed to loun through the valley, flowing gently.
meanings.sent5: The clouds louned across the sky, drifting lazily.
